page_analysis.text_content:
Light well & stairwell standards & site planning

• Such features may not be located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard.

• Maximum width (interior dimension) is 3'.

• The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features may not exceed 30% of basement perimeter.

• Allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max (however feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line).

• Allowable encroachment into required rear yard is 4'.

• The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features or portions of features that encroach into the required yards, on all sides of the structure, may not exceed 15'.

• Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees.

• Public Works Department must approve drainage system.

Fig 39 Examples of site plan w/light wells & stairwells

Interior lot example

Lightwells & stairwells
Lightwells & stairwells that encroach into the rec yards

Lightwells & stairwells
• a + b (encroaching features) may not exceed 15'
• a + b + c + d (all features) may not exceed 30% of the perimeter of the basement

Note: measurments are based on interior dimension of opening and exclude encasing structure.

visual_elements.description: Site plan diagram labeled 'Interior lot example' showing a rectangular buildable area with a main dwelling inside. The diagram indicates rear yard, front yard, and interior side yards. It shows maximum widths of 3' for light wells and stairwells, with labeled dimensions a, b, c, and d representing different encroaching features. The diagram includes arrows and dimension lines illustrating 3' max width, 3' min from lot line, and 3' max into side yard. A key explains line types and shading: solid line for curb, dashed line for lot line, shaded rectangles for sidewalk, required setbacks, buildable area, dwelling, lightwells & stairwells, and lightwells & stairwells that encroach into the required yards.
visual_elements.location: Right half of the page, middle to bottom

Allowable encroachment into required side yard

Allowable encroachment into required rear yard

Sum of a + b + c + d (all features)

structural_elements.main_heading: Light well & stairwell standards & site planning

additional_notes: Measurements are based on interior dimension of opening and exclude encasing structure.
No handwritten notes, stamps, or markings detected.
Page number 42 at bottom left corner.
cross_references: Fig 39 Examples of site plan w/light wells & stairwells

qualifiers.text: Such features may not be located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard.
Measurements are based on interior dimension of opening and exclude encasing structure.
Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees.
Public Works Department must approve drainage system.
Allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max (however feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line).

conditions.text: The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features may not exceed 30% of basement perimeter.
Allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max.
Feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line.
Allowable encroachment into required rear yard is 4'.

The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features or portions of features that encroach into the required yards, on all sides of the structure, may not exceed 15'.

logical_relationships.expression: All conditions c1 through c6 must be met simultaneously for compliance.

execution_sequence.action: Verify that features are not located on the side of the structure facing the front yard (qualifier q1).
Check maximum width of features does not exceed 3 feet (condition c1).
Ensure combined length of all excavated features does not exceed 30% of basement perimeter (condition c2) applying measurement basis qualifier q2.
Confirm allowable encroachment into side yard is max 3 feet and feature is minimum 3 feet from side lot line (conditions c3 and c4) with qualifier q5.
Confirm allowable encroachment into rear yard is max 4 feet (condition c5).
Ensure combined length of all features encroaching into required yards does not exceed 15 feet (condition c6) applying measurement basis qualifier q2.
Verify excavated features are not harmful to neighboring trees (qualifier q3).
Obtain Public Works Department approval for drainage system (qualifier q4).
